Text:
You dont know who is putting viruses into their torrents, just down load the trail from nero.com and use this serial:
9004-027E-UM18-71C6-57TK-P034-UU8X-0U4A

Then add these to your hosts file to stop nero from calling home to check the key:
127.0.0.1 secure.nero.com/us/secure.asp
127.0.0.1 activation@nero.com

Then these codes for the plugins:
